Text: Can't seem to get this to work... Just asks to launch download...

did you copy the folder called gangstar to sd/gameloft/games? if not you can donwload it the normal way off gamelofts servers, just make sure you have your device in aeroplane mode when you launch the game, it will then ask you to activate either wifi or 3g, click the one you want and wait for the download to complete
dl and install worked fine but in-game many textures are whited out, buildings and my character
same as above, many textures including the character are whited out. I'm running Android 2.1 on a samsung galxy s.
The same. Im running Android 2.1 on Sony Ericsson xperia x10i

Awesome!! Thanks, THUG. Those having problems, you need Android 2.2 for this to work properly.

I have this on Desire with Android 2.2, works flawlessly.

Gameloft made a mistake not bringing this out in the UK. This is the only way I can get it. :]

Thanks again.
